info.title: HubSpot CMS
info.description: This connector is used to retrieve and make changes to HubSpot CMS. HubSpot CMS is a SaaS CMS designed to help businesses grow their web presence with a special emphasis on enabling marketers. It is designed to be used on business websites where non-technical content creators need to be able to build, measure, and iterate on content independently while working within design, style, and functionality. The content, lead collection, and analytics are also integrated with the HubSpot CRM.

get.description: Get all of your pages. Supports paging and filtering.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items to return. Defaults to 20.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: If True, the page will not show up in your dashboard, although the page will still be live.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the page to return.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the page to return.

campaign.title: Campaign
campaign.description: The guid of the marketing campaign this page is associated with

campaign_name.title: Campaign name
campaign_name.description: The name of the marketing campaign this page is associated with.

footer_html.title: Footer HTML
footer_html.description: Custom HTML for embed codes, javascript, etc. that goes in the <head> tag of the page.

meta_description.title: Meta description
meta_description.description: The meta description for the page.

meta_keywords.title: Meta keywords
meta_keywords.description: The meta keywords for the page.

password.title: Password
password.description: Set this to create a password protected page. Entering the password will be required to view the page.

publish_date.title: Publish date
publish_date.description: The publish date for the page.

publish_immediately.title: Publish immediately
publish_immediately.description: Set this to true if you want to be published immediately when the schedule publish endpoint is called, and to ignore the publish_date setting

subcategory.title: Subcategory
subcategory.description: This is set to empty or to "landing_page" for landing pages, or to "site_page" for site pages.

widget_containers.title: Widget containers
widget_containers.description: A data structure containing the data for all the modules inside the containers for this post.

widgets.title: Widgets
widgets.description: A data structure containing the data for all the modules for this page.

delete.description: Marks a page as deleted. Returns 204 No Content letting you know that the page was successfully deleted. The page can be restored later via a POST to the restore-deleted endpoint.

parameters.name: page_id
parameters.description: The page ID of the page.

put.description: Updates a page in the database. If not all top level fields are included in the body, we will only update the included fields.

parameters.name: page_id
parameters.description: The page ID of the page.

campaign.title: Campaign
campaign.description: The guid of the marketing campaign this page is associated with.

campaign_name.title: Campaign name
campaign_name.description: The name of the marketing campaign this page is associated wit.

footer_html.title: Footer HTML
footer_html.description: Custom HTML for embed codes, javascript that should be placed before the </body> tag of the page.

head_html.title: Head HTML
head_html.description: Custom HTML for embed codes, javascript, etc. that goes in the <head> tag of the page.

meta_description.title: Meta description
meta_description.description: The meta description for the page.

meta_keywords.title: Meta keywords
meta_keywords.description: The meta keywords for the page

password.title: Password
password.description: Set this to create a password protected page. Entering the password will be required to view the page.

publish_date.title: Publish date
publish_date.description: The publish date of the page.

publish_immediately.title: Publish immediately
publish_immediately.description: Set this to true if you want to be published immediately when the schedule publish endpoint is called, and to ignore the publish_date setting.

subcategory.title: Subcategory
subcategory.description: This is set to empty or to "landing_page" for landing pages, or to "site_page" for site pages.

widget_containers.title: Widget containers
widget_containers.description: A data structure containing the data for all the modules inside the containers for this post.

widgets.title: Widgets
widgets.description: A data structure containing the data for all the modules for this page.

post.description: Either publishes or cancels publishing based on the POSTed JSON.

action.description: Either publishes or cancels publishing based on the selected action

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items to return. Defaults to 20.

post.description: Create a new coded template object in Design Manager.

category_id.description: The category id of the template

is_available_for_new_content.description: Used to determine if the template should be expected to pass page/content validation and be used with live content.

template_type.description: This parameter accepts a numeric value and sets the type of template that is created.

path.title: Path
path.description: The Design Manager path to the directory that contains the file being created.

source.title: Source
source.description: The source code of the file.

delete.description: Marks the selected Template as deleted. The Template can be restored later via a POST to the restore-deleted endpoint.

put.description: Updates a template. If not all the fields are included in the body, we will only update the included fields.

source.title: Source
source.description: The source code of the file.
